00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 
00031 #include<iostream>
00032 #include<assert.h>
00033 
00034 class QNode {
00035   friend class Queue;
00036   int my_item;
00037   QNode * my_next;
00038   QNode(int item, QNode * next = 0): my_item(item), my_next(next) {}
00039   ~QNode() { delete my_next; }
00040 };
00041 
00042 class Queue {
00043   QNode * my_front;             // items are removed at this end
00044   QNode * my_rear;              // new items are added at this end
00045   int my_length;                // number of items
00046 public:
00047   Queue(): my_front(0), my_rear(0), my_length(0) {}
00048   ~Queue() { delete my_front; }
00049 
00050   bool is_empty() { return 0 == my_front; }
00051 
00052   int length() { return my_length; }
00053 
00054   void add(int item)
00055     {
00056       if ( 0 == my_rear ) {
00057         my_front = my_rear = new QNode(item);
00058       }
00059       else {
00060         my_rear->my_next = new QNode(item);
00061         my_rear = my_rear->my_next;
00062       }
00063       ++my_length;
00064     }
00065 
00066   void remove()
00067     {
00068       assert( 0 != my_front && 0 != my_rear );
00069       if ( my_front == my_rear ) {
00070         delete my_front;
00071         my_front = my_rear = 0;
00072       }
00073       else {
00074         QNode * to_be_deleted = my_front;
00075         my_front = my_front->my_next;
00076         to_be_deleted->my_next = 0;
00077         delete to_be_deleted;
00078       }
00079       --my_length;
00080     }
00081 
00082   int front() const
00083     {
00084       return my_front->my_item;
00085     }
00086 };
